about_me.en: I am Gang Sun, a first-year master's student in the field of Computer Technology at Xiamen University, supervised by Professor Zhirong Shen. My current research interests include high-bandwidth memory (HBM), AI operator behavior modeling, and heterogeneous integrated memory technologies. You can find more information about me on my personal website: `https://deepcity.github.io/`
about_me.zh: 我是孙港，来自厦门大学计算机技术专业的一年级硕士研究生，导师是沈志荣教授。我目前的研究兴趣包括高带宽内存、AI算子行为建模、异构融合内存。我的主页是`https://deepcity.github.io/`。

en.major: Software Engineering, Jiangxi University of Science and Technology

zh.major: 计算机科学, 厦门大学
软件工程，江西理工大学
